Summary: Travel from Natchitoches,La. to Alexanderia,La. to New orleans I-49 south.
divs: sighting detailsmyself *(wit's and wife's name deleted--cms\sg) earley morning about 7:00 am was traveling southeast at 70 miles an hour from a visit to my parents.it was approx.58 degrees in november 2001,partly cloudy with blue skies in the background.my wife said what is that up there?,i said what?then i looked up tp my left in the sky and saw an object.1 then 2 objects shaped like two triangles the skin on the object was like a mirror or polished aluminum.they were moving or floating northwest.i have been in aviation as a mechanic and a flight crew member for 28 years at the time.i knew of england air force base 60 miles away but it had been closed for years.then the sun's rays hit the skin of the object and it was blinding like a mirror,i thought maybe it was world war ii aircraft with polished aluminum but those are special and have to have a permitt from the faa to have that type skin.then i looked for wings,there was no rotor blades,propellers,exhaust,ice crystals as if jet at high altitude,no noise just moving to our left silently.then there was4 more shapes appeared just like the first 2 shapes.they were about 300ft.to 600ft.they were in a flight formation of one on top two underneath then 2 under that then one under that.i said to my wife what is that she said it looks like triangle polished aliminum shark fins.i replied yes that is what i see.i had a video camera in the back seat but i though if i stop they will be gone.then they flew thru some light clouds then disappering by 2 then down to 1 then they were gone.i have searched the internet and found that shape in somebody else's photo.i stil;l question my wife what did u see she said polished flying shark fins,she don't want me to ask her anymore because she said i'm going to drive her crazy!i keep asking her over and over just to confirm what i saw and she agreess with me.i have told a couple of family and friends but they just act like i was not talking to them.i wished i could have stopped and got the video.i just started talking about this in the end of 2010.i have sketched the shapes and put them in their flight formation we saw at the time.could not attach microsoft power point of flight formatiom.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Natchitoches
This sighting has never been favorited.
